sentence.Network_en: Danger did not daunt the hero.
sentence.Network_cn: 危险并没有吓倒这位英雄.

sentence.Network_en: Even a greater natural calamity cannot daunt us.
sentence.Network_cn: 再大的自然灾害也压不垮我们.
危险并没有吓住那英雄.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... daub 乱涂 daunt 威吓 dawn insomnia 黎明失眠症黎明失眠症.

不择手段记单词(赵丽,湖南文艺出版社) ... flaunt vt. 炫耀，标榜 daunt vt. 恐吓，使畏缩， 使胆怯[丧胆]， 使气馁 vaunt vt. 吹牛.
专八词汇表_百度文库 ... Danish 丹麦文 daunt 使胆怯，使畏缩 dauntless 勇敢的，无畏的.

jx.jx_en_mean: without having been made fearful or apprehensive

lj.lj_ly: nothing daunted, the committee set to work.
lj.lj_ls: 委员会无所畏惧地开始工作了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French danter, from Latin domitare, frequentative of domare 'to tame'

entry.def: If something daunts you, it makes you feel slightly afraid or worried about dealing with it.

example.ex: ...a gruelling journey that would have daunted a woman half her age...
example.tran: 比她年轻一半的女子都会胆怯的累人旅程

example.ex: I'm somewhat daunted by the size of the task.
example.tran: 我有点儿被这项任务的规模吓着了。

auth_sentence.content: None of this seems to daunt Charles Taylor, however.
auth_sentence.res_content: None of this seems to daunt Charles Taylor, however.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of this seems to daunt Charles Taylor, however.

auth_sentence.content: Such barriers to religion, which daunt those not brought up to them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such barriers to religion, which daunt those not brought up to them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such barriers to religion, which daunt those not brought up to them.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, Will Daunt's voice occasionally has the double-tracked nuances of Chris Martin on this set's largest choruses.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact, Will Daunt's voice occasionally has the double-tracked nuances of Chris Martin on this set's largest choruses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact, Will Daunt's voice occasionally has the double-tracked nuances of Chris Martin on this set's largest choruses.

sentences.en: Danger did not daunt the hero.
sentences.cn: 危险并没有吓倒这位英雄。

sentences.en: He was not to be daunted by the most gigantic word in the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 词典上最长的词也难不倒他。

sentences.en: She was not at all daunted by the size of the problem.
sentences.cn: 她一点也不为问题的严重性所吓倒。

sentences.en: He was daunted by the high quality of work they expected.
sentences.cn: 他被他们对工作的高品质的要求吓倒了。

sentences.en: She was a brave woman but she felt daunted by the task ahead.
sentences.cn: 她是一个勇敢的女人, 但对面前的任务却感到信心不足。

jushi.english: He was not to be daunted by the most gigantic word in the dictionary.
jushi.chinese: 词典上最长的词也难倒不他。

jushi.english: Danger did not daunt the hero.
jushi.chinese: 危险并没有吓倒这位英雄。

jushi.english: She was not at all daunted by the size of the problem.
jushi.chinese: 她一点也不为问题的严重性所吓倒。
